title: Episode 14 - Gary Vaynerchuk, CEO and co-founder of VaynerMedia
description: In this discussion about professional motivation and understanding consumer behavior, internet personality and bestselling author Gary Vaynerchuk looks at innovation and entrepreneurship through an unorthodox lens.
dc:creator: Bloomberg
itunes:summary: In this discussion about professional motivation and understanding consumer behavior, internet personality and bestselling author Gary Vaynerchuk looks at innovation and entrepreneurship through an unorthodox lens.
